exm.mng: Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period, the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius, mastermind
tuber of the kudzu vine (Pueraria lobata), used in Chinese medicine
name of a place, Gezhouba Dam on the Changjiang River, in Sichuan
intertwined (as melon and vine plants), interconnected, association (of two things)
Changge county level city in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan
